Home 2025.09

Thank you for providing the specific details for your May 2025 payment. This confirms that you are indeed using the Equal Principal Payment method and that the interest rate currently applied is 3.65% per annum.

Based on the information you provided for May 2025:

  • Remaining Loan Principal at the start of May 2025: 835,491 CNY
  • Monthly Principal Payment in May 2025: 4055.79 CNY
  • Monthly Interest Payment in May 2025: 2541.29 CNY
  • Total Monthly Payment in May 2025: 6597.08 CNY (4055.79 + 2541.29)
  • Current Annual Interest Rate: 3.65% (Monthly rate ≈ 0.0365 / 12)

In the Equal Principal Payment method:

  • The amount of principal you repay each month is constant. Based on your May 2025 payment, this constant monthly principal amount is 4055.79 CNY.
  • The amount of interest you pay each month decreases because it is calculated on the remaining principal balance, which gets smaller each month.
  • The total monthly payment (Principal + Interest) therefore decreases each month.

The remaining principal of 835,491 CNY at the start of May 2025, paid off with a constant principal payment of 4055.79 CNY per month, indicates a remaining term of approximately $835,491 / 4055.79 \approx 206$ months. This aligns with May 2025 being month 35 of your original 240-month term ($240 - 35 + 1 = 206$ months remaining, including the May 2025 payment).

Here’s how your future monthly payments will look:

  • From May 2025 onwards: Your monthly payment will consist of the constant principal payment of 4055.79 CNY plus the decreasing interest calculated on the remaining balance at a rate of 3.65% per annum.

By December 2025 (Month 42 of the loan term), the remaining principal at the start of the month will be approximately 807,100.47 CNY.
